QxtNetwork Module

The QxtNetwork module extends QtNetwork with RPC functionality.

QxtRPCPeerTransmits Qt signals over a network connection.
QxtTcpConnectionManagerAccepts TCP connections and maintains a connection pool.

Detailed Description

To include the definitions of all the module's classes, use the following directive:

 #include <QxtNetwork>
